headline.print_headline: Snowden Won't Return to U.S. Without Amnesty, Says Legal Adviser
headline.main: Snowden Won't Return to U.S. Without Amnesty, Says Legal Adviser

docs.snippet: Edward Snowden would be willing to enter talks with U.S. Attorney General Eric Holder to negotiate his return to the United States but not without a guarantee of amnesty, his legal adviser said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Edward Snowden would be willing to enter talks with U.S. Attorney General Eric Holder to negotiate his return to the United States but not without a guarantee of amnesty, his legal adviser said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Growing Up in Africa Impacts 'Walking Dead' Actor
headline.main: Growing Up in Africa Impacts 'Walking Dead' Actor

docs.snippet: Growing up in Zimbabwe and visiting South Africa as a young woman helped forge Danai Gurira's passion for producing theater in Africa....
docs.lead_paragraph: Growing up in Zimbabwe and visiting South Africa as a young woman helped forge Danai Gurira's passion for producing theater in Africa.

headline.print_headline: New Models, More Production Could Boost Hyundai Shares: Barron's
headline.main: New Models, More Production Could Boost Hyundai Shares: Barron's

docs.snippet: Investors are underestimating Hyundai Motor Co's ability to turn around itself and its stock after rocky period, according to Barron's in its January 27 edition....
docs.lead_paragraph: Investors are underestimating Hyundai Motor Co's ability to turn around itself and its stock after rocky period, according to Barron's in its January 27 edition.

headline.main: 'I, Frankenstein' Disappoints at the Box Office

docs.snippet: “I, Frankenstein” generated just $8.3 million in ticket sales — a terrible result for a movie that cost $65 million to make and tens of millions more to advertise....
docs.abstract: “I, Frankenstein” generated just $8.3 million in ticket sales — a terrible result for a movie that cost $65 million to make and tens of millions more to advertise.

headline.print_headline: Italy's Renzi Faces Battle in Parliament on Election Reform
headline.main: Italy's Renzi Faces Battle in Parliament on Election Reform

docs.snippet: Italy's center-left leader Matteo Renzi faces opposition in parliament next week over electoral reform plans agreed with Silvio Berlusconi which are being closely watched as a test of wider reforms in the euro zone's third largest economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's center-left leader Matteo Renzi faces opposition in parliament next week over electoral reform plans agreed with Silvio Berlusconi which are being closely watched as a test of wider reforms in the euro zone's third largest economy.

headline.print_headline: Texas Hospital to End Care for Brain-Dead Woman
headline.main: Texas Hospital to End Care for Brain-Dead Woman

docs.snippet: A Texas hospital says it will follow a judge's order to remove life support from a pregnant, brain-dead woman....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Texas hospital says it will follow a judge's order to remove life support from a pregnant, brain-dead woman.

docs.snippet: Chelsea have completed the signing of Basel's Egyptian winger Mohamed Salah, the Premier League club said on their website on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea have completed the signing of Basel's Egyptian winger Mohamed Salah, the Premier League club said on their website on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Attorneys Promote Gay Marriage Doc at Sundance
headline.main: Attorneys Promote Gay Marriage Doc at Sundance

docs.snippet: Attorneys Ted Olson and David Boies once argued the Bush v. Gore case in front of the U.S. Supreme Court, but they say fighting California's law prohibiting same-sex marriage is the most significant thing they've done....
docs.lead_paragraph: Attorneys Ted Olson and David Boies once argued the Bush v. Gore case in front of the U.S. Supreme Court, but they say fighting California's law prohibiting same-sex marriage is the most significant thing they've done.

headline.print_headline: Syrian Government Says Women, Children Can Leave Homs District: Mediator
headline.main: Syrian Government Says Women, Children Can Leave Homs District: Mediator

docs.snippet: International mediator Lakhdar Brahimi said on Sunday that the Syrian government delegation at peace talks in Geneva had told him that authorities would allow women and children to leave the besieged old district of Homs city straight away....
docs.lead_paragraph: International mediator Lakhdar Brahimi said on Sunday that the Syrian government delegation at peace talks in Geneva had told him that authorities would allow women and children to leave the besieged old district of Homs city straight away.

docs.snippet: The Kevin Hart comedy "Ride Along" continued to speed through a typically quiet box-office frame, while the monster thriller "I, Frankenstein" couldn't be roused from the dead....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Kevin Hart comedy "Ride Along" continued to speed through a typically quiet box-office frame, while the monster thriller "I, Frankenstein" couldn't be roused from the dead.
